title: Robust battery interphases from dilute fluorinated cations
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4137-4146
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00296B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Chulgi Nathan Hong, Mengwen Yan, Oleg Borodin, Travis P. Pollard, Langyuan Wu, Manuel Reiter, Dario Gomez Vazquez, Katharina Trapp, Ji Mun Yoo, Netanel Shpigel, Jeremy I. Feldblyum, Maria R. Lukatskaya
This approach utilizes electrostatic attraction of very low fractions (~0.1 wt%) of readily reducible fluorinated cations in electrolyte to form a robust fluorine-rich SEI and enable stable Li-metal batteries.
